nodes.bodyText: Can we get the same comment we have in the other places here, too please?
Maybe we could (instead) define all those equal regexes directly as constant in some central place? But comment here would help if this is not possible or too difficult.
Why is the ? needed? Shouldn't * match between zero (which covers the ? case) and infinity times?
I guess this would be a reluctant quantifier. But I don't know if this is needed (could be).
